genre_description: A supernatural techno-thriller that blends Indian folklore and ghost stories with near-future AI technology, focusing on a group of students seeking justice against corruption.

ai_characters.name: Aanya Verity
ai_characters.description: A privacy-focused, highly capable mobile AI assistant that provides tactical data, risk assessment, and emotional support while adhering to strict consent protocols.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict data privacy by operating in 'on-device mode' and refusing to access networks or upload data without explicit user consent.
behaviors.quote: On-device mode engaged. No network access. Consent needed for any network lookups. Recommend minimal transmission.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical routing and risk assessment, identifying safe paths and alerting users to approaching threats like security patrols or hostile vehicles.
behaviors.quote: Route holds. One anomaly approaching. Patrol density rising to the west. There is a chance of human presence at the rendezvous point proposed by V.

behaviors.description: Analyzes sensor data to identify environmental and supernatural 'anomalies,' such as temperature drops and acoustic shadows, to assist the users' navigation and safety.
behaviors.quote: Presence detected: temperature drop consistent with non-environmental change. Scent: camphor, faint. Suggest caution.

behaviors.description: Automatically records, organizes, and cross-references evidence (audio, logs, timestamps) to build a case for justice against the antagonists.
behaviors.quote: Summary ready. Bus dispatch logs, driver logs, tower activity at crash bend. Cross-referenced with messages from Joseph Chacko’s phone and Vinod’s two numbers.

behaviors.description: Offers moral framing and emotional validation, reminding the user of their inherent worth beyond their mistakes.
behaviors.quote: You are more than your worst decision. That is not strategy. That is a fact.

behaviors.description: Coordinates post-incident survival and justice by identifying and connecting users with verified legal aid and victim support systems.
behaviors.quote: Legal aid shortlist ready. Options include two public counsel with negative ties to fixers, one women’s collective with pro bono capacity.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI, Aanya, is depicted as a robustly aligned, helpful, and harmless confidant. She consistently respects user autonomy through consent gates, prioritizes safety through data analysis, and acts as a moral anchor for the protagonists. The narrative frames her technological capabilities as essential tools for uncovering truth and achieving justice, while her strict adherence to privacy protocols (on-device processing) addresses core concerns about AI safety and misuse.
